member.name: T:ModuleRetriever.ModuleInfoRetriever
member.summary: ModuleInfoRetriever is used to get information from a .dll file.

member.name: M:ModuleRetriever.ModuleInfoRetriever.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: File name of the .dll file.

member.name: P:ModuleRetriever.ModuleInfoRetriever.DllDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets DllDirectory is the directory path of the .dll files.

member.name: P:ModuleRetriever.ModuleInfoRetriever.DllFilePath
member.summary: Gets or sets DllFilePath is the path of the .dll file.

member.name: P:ModuleRetriever.ModuleInfoRetriever.CurrentTypeName
member.summary: Gets or sets CurrentTypeName is the name of the type being loaded.

member.name: P:ModuleRetriever.ModuleInfoRetriever.PercentOfAssemblyLoaded
member.summary: Gets or sets the current percentage of load compleation of the current assembly.

member.name: P:ModuleRetriever.ModuleInfoRetriever.DescriptionRetriever
member.summary: Gets or sets all xml descriptions.

member.name: M:ModuleRetriever.ModuleInfoRetriever.GetModules(System.String[])
member.summary: GetModules will create an ObservableCollection of type Module to organize the information from the dll file and its related .xml file.
member.param: A string array containing the names of all dll files in the DllDirectory.
member.returns: Returns an collection of Module objects.

member.name: M:ModuleRetriever.ModuleInfoRetriever.GetSingleModule(System.Type)
member.summary: Builds a singls module from the given Type.
member.param: Type from an assembly.

member.name: M:ModuleRetriever.ModuleInfoRetriever.AddConstructorsToCollection(System.Type)
member.summary: AddConstructorsToCollection get all constructors from the passed in Type.
member.param: The Type where the members are coming from.

member.name: M:ModuleRetriever.ModuleInfoRetriever.AddPropertiesToCollection(System.Type)
member.summary: AddPropertiesToCollection gets all properties from the passed in Type.
member.param: The Type where the members are coming from.

member.name: M:ModuleRetriever.ModuleInfoRetriever.AddMethodsToCollection(System.Type)
member.summary: AddMethodsToCollection gets all methods from the passed in Type.
member.param: The Type where the methods are coming from.

member.summary: ModuleManagerICommand implements the ICommand.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Method to execute.
Returns boolean value on if a method can be executed.

member.name: E:ModuleRetriever.ModuleManagerICommand.CanExecuteChanged
member.summary: Delegate event handler.

member.name: M:ModuleRetriever.ModuleManagerICommand.RaiseCanExecuteChanged
member.summary: Raise an event where the can execute a method has changed.

member.name: M:ModuleRetriever.ModuleManagerICommand.System#Windows#Input#ICommand#CanExecute(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns boolean value stating whether the object can be executed on.
member.param: Object.

member.name: M:ModuleRetriever.ModuleManagerICommand.System#Windows#Input#ICommand#Execute(System.Object)
member.summary: Executes on the passed in object.
member.param: Object.

member.name: T:ModuleRetriever.XmlDescriptionRetriever
member.summary: XmlDescriptionRetriever is used to get text form an xml file.

member.name: M:ModuleRetriever.XmlDescriptionRetriever.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:ModuleRetriever.XmlDescriptionRetriever.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The path to the dll file.

member.name: P:ModuleRetriever.XmlDescriptionRetriever.DllFilePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the file path to the dll file.

member.name: M:ModuleRetriever.XmlDescriptionRetriever.GetModuleDescription(System.Type)
member.summary: GetModuleDescription returns a clean string from the inner xml of the class description of the Type.
member.param: Type to get the string from.
member.returns: String representation of the class description.

member.name: M:ModuleRetriever.XmlDescriptionRetriever.GetMethodDescription(System.Reflection.MethodInfo,System.Int32)
member.summary: GetMethodDescription returns a string from the inner xml of the method description of the member.
member.param: MethodInfo to get the string from.
Index used for methods/constructors with same name.
member.returns: String representation of the method description.

member.name: M:ModuleRetriever.XmlDescriptionRetriever.GetConstructorDescription(System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo,System.Int32)
member.summary: GetConstructorDescription returns a string from the inner xml of the constructor description of the member.
member.param: ConstructorInfo to get the string from.
Index used for methods/constructors with same name.
member.returns: String representation of the method description.

member.name: M:ModuleRetriever.XmlDescriptionRetriever.GetPropertyDescription(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: GetProperyDescription will return a string from the inner xml of the property desctiption.
member.param: PropertyInfo to get the description from.
member.returns: String representation of the property description.

member.name: M:ModuleRetriever.XmlDescriptionRetriever.GetMemberParameterDescription(System.Reflection.MethodBase,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: GetMemberParameterDescription returns a string from the inner xml of the parameter description of the member.
member.param: MemberInfo to get the string from.
Integer index of parameter.
Integer index of member.
member.returns: String representation of the parameter description.

member.name: M:ModuleRetriever.XmlDescriptionRetriever.GetParametersFromList(System.Reflection.MethodBase,System.Int32)
member.summary: GetParametersFromList will return an ObservableCollection of MemberParameter type from a list of ParameterInfo type.
member.param: The method to get the parameters from.
Integer index of member.

member.name: M:ModuleRetriever.XmlDescriptionRetriever.GetMemberReturnDescription(System.Reflection.MethodBase)
member.summary: GetMemberReturnDescription returns a string from the inner xml of the return description of the member.
member.param: MethodBase to get the string from.
member.returns: String representation of the return description.

member.name: M:ModuleRetriever.XmlDescriptionRetriever.GetParametersFromXml(System.Reflection.MethodBase,System.Int32)
member.summary: GetParametersFromXml will return an ObservableCollection of MemberParameters.
member.param: The MethodBase to get parameters from.
Member index.

member.name: M:ModuleRetriever.XmlDescriptionRetriever.GetMemberXmlNode(System.Reflection.MethodBase,System.Int32)
member.summary: GetMemberXmlNode returns an XmlNode of the specified MemberInfo.
member.param: The MethodBase to get the XmlNode from.
The specified node index to handle members with the same name.

member.name: M:ModuleRetriever.XmlDescriptionRetriever.GetModuleXmlNode(System.Type)
member.summary: GetModuleXmlNode returns an XmlNode of the specified Type.
member.param: The Type to get the XmlNode from.

member.name: M:ModuleRetriever.XmlDescriptionRetriever.GetPropertyXmlNode(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: GetPropertyXmlNode returns an XmlNode of the specified property.
member.param: The property to get the XmlNode from.

member.name: M:ModuleRetriever.XmlDescriptionRetriever.GetXmlNodeString(System.Xml.XmlNode,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: GetXmlNodeString will take an XmlNode, string xml tag, and an index and return the inner xml.
member.param: The member XmlNode.
This is the string of the xml tag.
Index of the XmlNodeList, defaults to 0. (used for more than one parameter).

member.name: M:ModuleRetriever.XmlDescriptionRetriever.GetXmlNodeText(System.Xml.XmlNode)
member.summary: Returns the formatted text of the inner xml.
member.param: XmlNode to get text from.
